name: Live America
overview:
LiveAmerica.com was developed as a platform to enable teachers and students to come together in a rich, interactive and cost effective online classroom environment.

LiveAmerica.com is a SaaS application built on proprietary technology that can be used to conduct multi-location business meetings, sales presentations and classroom trainings. It features cam to multi-cam functionality and operates on a robust hosted engine which delivers high performance at a low cost for the educators and users.

LiveAmerica’s software is also licensed for private label use through our OEM program to educational and business institutions.

What makes Live Americaâ€™s software unique from other programs offering similar web conferencing and educational services is the cam to multi-cam capabilities and management console where the host can easily manage webcams and microphones of the participants allowing a true virtual interactive environment. The engine is powerful, the user interface is simple to use which allows the presenters and trainers focus on productivity and content delivery.
